page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In the playground we play games like Chasing, Hide and Seek and Tiggy. At Tiggy somebody has to be on and then chases the other people until he touches someone else. Then they are on and the game carries on like this. We also play Farmer, Farmer Can I Cross Your Golden Water? Somebody is the Farmer and he lets the other people cross the yard using fairy steps or giant strides. In the summer we can go on the school field and play ball games. The girls play rounders and tennis, and the boys play cricket and football. If there are only a few boys we play Three and In. We use our coats for goal posts and just have one goal. The person who scores three goals first has to go in goal next. If there are more boys we pick two sides and have a proper game of football.
